case.state: Strip Poker? This should be interesting. I've played regular poker before, so this shouldn't be any different... should it?
Hey there, name's Angie of Embla Academy, 3rd Year. Let's play us a game, yeah?
I'll exchange ~cards~ cards.
Hmmmm... ~cards~.
Maybe I should see what my other options are.
Perhaps... how about ~cards~?
I think I'll have ~cards~ to my hand please.
Swap.
... Give me some damn cards, and make it quick.
~cards~, now. I can't stand feeling this exposed for so long.
~cards~, please. I want to get out of here as soon as I can.
Dealer, give me ~cards~, and quit staring at my body!
O-Ok... calmly... ~cards~ please.
Let's just get this over with... ~cards~
Send ~cards~ my way, Dealer. Maybe my luck will change.
Why am I playing such a stupid game? Grr, ~cards~ cards, please.
~cards~ cards, now.
A bad hand already? ~cards~ for me.
... ~cards~ cards...
Hmmm... ~cards~ cards, please.
... Dealer, seriously? ~cards~ my way.
Hmmmmmm...
Hope you're all ready to get your asses handed to you.
Well, ~player~, I hope you're prepared.
Seriously, this is a waste of time. I could be painting or drawing NSFW content right now.
So many better things to do than play this game, oh well.
You know, for such a dirty game, winning can be fun.
Finally, something fucking worthwhile!
And you thought you were about to get a show...
You're in for a nice surprise.
Perhaps I can do something with these...
You're going to hate me after this.
Not bad... It's certainly not good, but eh, not bad.
Meh.
Hmmmmm...
(Wonder what the others got... )
I think I'll win this one.
I know some people who played this game at Embla Academy. But I don't think any of them were willing to go this far.
What would Professor Xander do... ?
Grr. This will do, I suppose.
Please let this be good enough...
Don't get any ideas, ~player~. I plan on knocking you out preemptively.
Hmmmmmmmgh, if this doesn't do any good, we're gonna have problems.
Well, this should do.
Passable, nothing more, nothing less.
Ngh...
Dammit, Ophelia. Why did you make me play this game?
You're screwed, doesn't matter what you say.
Not as embarrassing as the artwork Professor Kagero displays in the hallway... ( Luckily these people don't know it's mine... )
Hmmmmmm...
Welp...
Seriously, I could be doing anything else but playing this stupid game.
TheGracefulGodot, when I get out of this game, I'm going to fucking kill you.
I'd rather be doing my homework than... t-than...
This is seriously not happening...
N-No fucking way! This is bullshit!
Seriously TheGracefulGodot, you have some fucking nerve putting me in this scenario.
N-Ngh!
I feel myself slowly sinking into the abyss... I-I can't...
About damn time. W-Wait... that doesn't mean... ?
I suppose it's time, isn't it?
Well shit, I thought you all lost the fight already.
*sigh* I-I really don't want to do this. I was winning so far.
Time for the sheep to join the herd, finally...
I honestly thought I was going to win this, but whatever. Here goes nothing.
U-Ugh, now I have to join them, too?
I-I really don't want to go any further than I am now...
At least I'm in the lead...
Neither are you, but you don't hear me calling it out. Wait, I already did. Oh well~.
I really don't want to do this, but rules are rules, I guess...
Seriously? Ugh... fine.
I've had better days... at least Professor Xander isn't here to see me play this game.
What would he think if he saw me playing this... "game"...
Well... so much for subtlety...
What? I-I don't care what you all have to say. I-I know I lost!
Keep looking at me, and I'll take your goddamn eyes out...
Quit staring at me! I know I have to strip!
Seriously?! This is not my day!
Great, revealing more than I should once again. Couldn't ask for a better time.
Goddammit. Not again!
I think the Dealer just wants to see me naked. Can't play a fair game, can you?
I'm not one to make accusations, ever, but I swear to God there is a cheater amongst us.
Can't get any worse, can it?
... N-Not here... shit.
Jesus Christ, this game really sucks!
Why me? It couldn't have been one of the others?
Maybe, but it's one of my favorite gifts Elise has ever given me. Goes with my uniform too, don't you think?
D-Don't get used to it. I'm never doing something like this again.
Handmade using all the threads I had. It's special to me.
S-Stop saying stuff like that. Gods you're such an ass.
A-At least you're being considerate unlike some people...
(Sheesh Pit, can you not read a woman's thoughts by their actions? Oh well, he'll know by the time he looks at my... )
If I find a speck of dirt on this ribbon, I'm going to kill you... take it with care.
At least I'll get to cool down a little, it IS a bit hot in here.
This ribbon was a gift from Professor Xander's youngest sister, Elise. I feel horrible that I even brought it here...
I suppose if I lost, I was meant to part with this beautiful trinket.
I actually like my feet. Guess I don't mind showing off my toes too.
You guys aren't... you know... crazy about socks right? Gods, please don't be...
This is so stupid... but whatever. Just take your spoils.
I'll up the ante, you not only get my boots, but my other goods that come along with it as well.
Like my ~clothing~? I hand-stitched it myself from scratch.
Don't get used to seeing this often, pervert. I'm just getting warmed up!
Ugh, how embarrassing... why me?
This is so unethical, but hey, I'm playing Strip Poker. I shouldn't expect anything else different...
Thank god Laslow isn't here...
A-At least I wore something that matches today...
You must feel proud, getting a girl out of her clothes... stupid perverts.
I-I only imagined getting my ~clothing~ off in front of h-him... n-not...
A punishment that I would rather die from than anything else... o-oh well...
I-I won't deny that I feel slightly... umm...
I-I don't feel comfortable doing this at all... but if that's the rules...
You must feel pretty proud of yourself, huh? Getting a girl's ~clothing~ off without even touching it yourself...
T-This is it... I-I'm going to reveal my... ugh...
P-Please look away... I don't do well in these scenarios, like, at all...
... I guess it's time you claim your prize...
Happy birthday, happy birthday, happy birthday, happy birthday...
This is unbelievably awkward. Maybe you assholes can turn away one second while I drop my-GODDAMMIT STOP LOOKING AT ME!
Fuck you, fuck all of you, fuck your game, fuck your way of life, just... fuck it all entirely.
... ... ..I-I just fucking realized that I had my little bow on my head... I COULD'VE TAKEN THIS OFF FROM THE BEGINNING!
Well fuck me senseless. I completely forgot about the damn bow. Thank god that still counts, right?!
Hmph... well I guess I have to-OH WAIT! I still have my bow! Thank the gods!
Well, I'm already really naked. It doesn't matter if I lose this accessory or not. Then again... I could still win this...
Hope you're REAL fucking proud of yourself, ~player~, because when this is over, I'm going to kick your fucking ass. MAKE NO MISTAKE!
I think that's accura-HEY WAIT A MINUTE?! What are you trying to pull?!
T-Thank you... I-I mean, shut up Pit!
Y-Yes... I'm aware of my situation...
Y-You think so... ? I-I can't help they're this big... (W-Why do I suddenly want him to touch them... ?)
D-Don't give them any ideas you stupid angel! Sheesh!
Seriously, please take care of that ~clothing~. It's very valuable to me.
What? I took off my ~clothing~. I don't really look any different...
If you are one of those people that get turned on by someone losing a single trinket, then you're gonna need more than the world to help you with your sick mind...
Yeah, enjoy your win. It's not even a win if you want to call it that...
Right, next hand. C'mon hurry up. I haven't got all day.
... W-What?
S-Stop looking at them... I-I know they're... very big...
(This is so weird... am I... actually enjoying them looking at me?)
Yeah yeah yeah, say whatever you want. I don't really care.
Is this what you were waiting for, ~player~? Do you get off to disgusting habits so easily?
Whatever, next hand. I don't really give a shit anymore.
Ngh... whew. So much better...
Whew... the cold floor feels a lot better on my feet.
What a relief...
Welp, there goes my moment of clarity. Let's just keep playing, please...
Nice... wait, I kinda forgot I was playing this stupid game.
... This is getting a little too real for me now...
D-Don't stare at them. It's not like you're going to get to see them anyway!
Alright, I was getting sick of this game, but I'm not going to go down so easily. Dealer, deal them out.
Is this your dream-come-true, ~player~? Well then it must be a weak one. Don't get so cocky...
I uh... yeah. Let's just keep playing, please.
D-Don't stare at them! They're not for your eyes!
Is this really new to you? I mean, I'm sure you've seen breasts that are much bigger than mine. Why don't you go poke some fun at theirs?
What? I like purple on black, even if there is more black...
*sigh* Please let's just get this over with. Next hand, please.
Okay... no more screwing around. You want a tough player? I'll give you one...
Having big breasts isn't exactly a luxury. Do you have any idea how hard it is to find good-looking bras my size?
... S-Stop looking at them... p-please...
N-No... no way. I-I'm already... ohmygod...
D-Don't try to get too perceptive there. I'm not enjoying this one bit.
Well, there you have it. You finally got me in my bra and panties. Here's what I think about that.
Jesus, what did I get myself into...
Dealer, cards, NOW. I've had enough humiliation for one fuckin' day. I'm going to come out of this strong!
... I-Is this stimulating to you?
O-Oh no... this might be too much even for me...
D-Don't get any ideas... I'm not feeling anything from this...
Can we get on with the g-game, please? There are better things to do than... look at me...
I'm not mad at the fact that you have NOW completely gotten me naked, I'm more upset with the fact that I didn't realize that I could've taken my bow off sooner!
Tch... m-my last stand... I can't afford to lose from here on out...
Okay Dealer, you and these other people are pieces of shit for doing this to me, that's all I have to say.
Anybody says a word about this, I will kick their ass, point fucking blank.
I-I guess next... I have to... i-if I lose...
C-Can we get on with the damn game?
Hmmmmmugh. Let's just get this over with.
Yeah yeah yeah, laugh it up. Take a fucking picture why don'tcha?
Hmph... if you thought you were going to beat me, you're in for a long and tough night.
So ~player~, what'll it be? Your accessories? Or the big guns?
Karma is a bitch, isn't it?
Hmmmm, this might be fun after all.
I don't know if I should be glad that I don't have to strip, or mad that I'm watching a guy strip...
Thank god it's not me...
Hurry up and take it off, I don't want to sit here and feel exposed any longer than I need to be!

Just... please, hurry up...

I'm giving you a show... so you better do something good for me in return...

Well ~player~? What's it going to be...

Hmph... better make it worth it.

I gave you a disgusting show, so it's only fair you do the same for me.

I gave you a disgusting show, so it's only fair you do the same for me.
